description: East London’s most experienced makers, Constructive and Co., give We Design Homes a rare glimpse inside their studio and introduce us to some their most magnificent home projects.

factsheet.heading: Creating thoughtful homes with Constructive and Co.
paragraphs: As part of this year’s festival, We Design Homes invites you to join us in a series of online talks with some of the UK’s leading design-led architects and makers, as they take us through a journey of recent projects whilst discussing what it takes to create some of London's most exceptionally thoughtful homes.

factsheet.heading: Constructive and Co.
paragraphs: One of East London’s most experienced makers, Constructive and Co., give us a rare glimpse inside their studio and introduce us to some their most magnificent home projects, whilst demonstrating how much they care about the quality of the creative process, just as much as the finished product.

Founded by Dom, Sam and Tim back in 2010, and avid supporters of We Design Homes, the team takes great pride in supporting design-led architects and enthusiastic homeowners to design, create and fit beautiful, bespoke kitchens, cabinets and furniture.

images.title: Mount Pleasant Villas designed by Constructive and Co.

name: Creating thoughtful homes with Constructive and Co.
